p: Madin Darby Canine Kidney (MDCK) and Adenocarcinomic human alveolar basal epithelial cells (A549) cells (ATCC, Rockville, MD, USA) were cultured in complete DMEM media, supplemented with 10% v/v fetal calf serum, 2 mM L-glutamine, and penicillin (100 U/ml)/streptomycin (100 μg/ml) (Thermo Fisher), at 37°C under 5% v/v CO 2, with fresh complete medium added every 2–3 days until 80% confluence was reached. Cell lines used in this study were subjected to a maximum of 7 passages for in vitro experiments.
